title: Product List Options Schema
description: Generates a product list page in the workspace.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the application.

skipConfig.description: Do not configure PLP in the integration hub.

directory.description: The directory name to create the workspace in.

path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

plpType.description: The type of product list page to use.
plpType.x-prompt: Which kind of PLP (Product List Page)?

epccClientId.description: The client id value for an Elastic Path Commerce Cloud store.

epccClientSecret.description: The client secret value for an Elastic Path Commerce Cloud store.

epccEndpointUrl.description: The geographical endpoint url for an Elastic Path Commerce Cloud store.

algoliaApplicationId.description: This is your unique application identifier. It's used to identify you when using Algolia's API.

algoliaAdminApiKey.description: This is the Algolia ADMIN API key. This will only be used for cli requests and not be output to your frontend code: this key is used to create, update and DELETE your indices.

algoliaSearchOnlyApiKey.description: This is the public API key that will be used in your frontend code. This key is only usable for search queries and sending data to the Insights API.
